summary: An email from an FBI agent to an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York, forwarding two attachments: 'Epstein_Blackbook.pdf' and 'USGME01088970_(masseuse_list).doc'. The email suggests the transfer of investigative materials related to the Epstein case.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: The recipient of the email at the Southern District of New York, to whom investigative materials (Epstein's black book and a masseuse list) are being forwarded.

events.title: Email Forwarding Epstein Materials
events.description: An FBI agent sends an email to an Assistant United States Attorney forwarding two attachments: 'Epstein_Blackbook.pdf' and a document labeled as a masseuse list.

locations.name: One Saint Andrew's Plaza
locations.context: Address of the Southern District of New York U.S. Attorney's Office in New York, NY.

locations.name: New York, NY
locations.context: Location of the Southern District of New York U.S. Attorney's Office.

keyFacts: An email dated July 21, 2021, shows an FBI agent forwarding two key documents related to the Epstein investigation to a federal prosecutor.
The forwarded attachments are titled 'Epstein_Blackbook.pdf' and 'USGME01088970_(masseuse_list).doc', indicating the transfer of potential evidence.
The recipient is an Assistant United States Attorney at the Southern District of New York, suggesting ongoing federal investigative activity in 2021.
